issue.title: [Java] Provide hash table based dictionary builder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6185](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6185). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is related ARROW-5862. We provide another type of dictionary builder based on hash table. Compared with a search based dictionary encoder, a hash table based encoder process each new element in O(1) time, but require extra memory space.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6185?focusedCommentId=16908673) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5054
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5054>
